text: Alain Turnier (died 1991) was a Haitian historian. He is the author of several best-selling books: * Les Etats-Unis et le Marché Haïtien * Avec Mérisier Jeannis * Quand la Nation Demande des Comptes ==References== * Category:Finance ministers of Haiti Category:Year of birth missing Category:1991 deaths Category:Haitian historians Category:Haitian male writers
title: Alain Turnier
